modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update business_app set app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, developer = #{developer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, developer_phone = #{developerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_url = #{packageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refuse_reason = #{refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
